description:
In 2035, in order to make a love game, Xu Youyuan, who was suffering from a mid-life crisis, decided to take down her old face and experience a love life. 

Unexpectedly, the appointment turned to be big trouble. 

Xu Youyuan: “Don’t ask, what good experience can you have during a date with a kid?” 

Shi Yue: “Do you want me to remind you of the 300-word praise you wrote for me?” 

This is an evaluation from an anonymous user: “I have to say that there is endless aftertaste, excellent technology, outstanding advantages, super battery life, and excellent user experience. I personally tested it, five-star praise…” 

Xu Youyuan:…

Sweet story, the young one is initiative.

The milky wolf sportsman pretends to be a pig and eats tiger puppies x middle-aged crisis game industry master.>
